creator: vic@outfitr.com
text:
This patch includes:
1. an XML document containing information about objects and properties in the 
XSL-FO standard, and FOP's compliance with them.
2. a DTD for documents of this type
3. an XSLT stylesheet to convert the document to HTML
4. the HTML output from the document & stylesheet (for reference purposes only)

The contents of this document are intended to combine the information on 
our "Implemented" and "Limitations" page. I am not sure what needs to be done 
to get this usable by Forrest -- please let me know if I can help.

The DTD may be usable by other Apache projects, although it may need to be made 
more flexible.

creator: vic@outfitr.com
text:
Created attachment 3791
tar file containing 4 documents (xml, dtd, xslt, html) for XSL-FO Compliance

creator: keiron@aftexsw.com

document.
Needs adjusting to get the colours in the table cells and dtd validation.
